label: logicA:energy_en
steps: [1] If the PV array receives strong sunlight, then it produces adequate DC power.
[2] If the PV array produces adequate DC power, then the inverter supplies AC power to the home.
[3] For every device x, if x is Energy Star certified, then x is energy efficient.
[4] The refrigerator is Energy Star certified.
[5] The PV array receives strong sunlight.
[6] The PV array produces adequate DC power (from [1] and [5]).
[7] The inverter supplies AC power to the home (from [2] and [6]).
[8] The refrigerator is energy efficient (from [3] and [4]).
[9] The inverter supplies AC power to the home and the refrigerator is energy efficient (from [7] and [8]).
